name: World Class Escape
description: World Class Escape is the new 20 level escape game from ajazgames. It has 20 different levels to play they are basically a game for time relaxing and energizing your brain work, the task given here are simple, find clues, solve puzzles, find the hidden objects, finally you will be able to escape each level successfully, have fun playing, more levels will be updated. great time !!!
